dishes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
dishes.description: Classic Italian pasta made with fresh spaghetti, crispy pancetta, eggs, and Parmesan cheese.

dishes.name: Margherita Pizza
dishes.description: A traditional Neapolitan pizza topped with fresh mozzarella, ripe tomatoes, fresh basil.

dishes.name: Lasagna
dishes.description: Layers of pasta, meat, and béchamel sauce baked to perfection.

dishes.name: Fettuccine Alfredo
dishes.description: Fettuccine pasta tossed in a rich and creamy Alfredo sauce.

dishes.name: Pesto Pasta
dishes.description: Pasta mixed with fresh basil pesto and topped with Parmesan.

dishes.name: Tiramisu
dishes.description: A classic Italian dessert made with coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cheese.

dishes.name: Risotto
dishes.description: Creamy rice dish cooked with broth and flavored with saffron and Parmesan.

dishes.name: Bruschetta
dishes.description: Grilled bread topped with a mixture of diced tomatoes, garlic, and basil.

dishes.name: Chicken Parmesan
dishes.description: Breaded chicken breast topped with marinara sauce and mozzarella cheese.

dishes.name: Eggplant Parmesan
dishes.description: Layers of breaded eggplant with marinara sauce and mozzarella cheese.

dishes.name: Caprese Salad
dishes.description: Fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil drizzled with balsamic glaze.

dishes.name: Pasta Primavera
dishes.description: Pasta tossed with fresh seasonal vegetables and olive oil.

dishes.name: Minestrone Soup
dishes.description: A hearty Italian soup filled with vegetables, beans, and pasta.

dishes.name: Gnocchi
dishes.description: Soft potato dumplings served with a choice of sauce.

dishes.name: Panna Cotta
dishes.description: A creamy Italian dessert topped with a berry sauce.

dishes.name: Seafood Linguine
dishes.description: Linguine pasta served with a mix of fresh seafood and tomato sauce.

dishes.name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
dishes.description: Bell peppers filled with a mixture of rice, ground meat, and spices.

dishes.name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
dishes.description: Assorted vegetables stir-fried with soy sauce and garlic.

dishes.name: Shrimp Scampi
dishes.description: Shrimp sautéed in garlic butter and served over pasta.

dishes.name: Chocolate Fondant
dishes.description: A rich chocolate dessert with a gooey center, served with vanilla ice cream.
